Who Webster's Board of Trustees donated to in the 2011-2012 Election Cycle

Pete Souza of the White House via Wikimedia Commons

 Originally published by The Journal at Webster University at https://websterjournal.com/2012/10/31/graphs-who-the-board-of-trustees-donated-to-for-the-2011-2012-election-cycle/   [Archived] 

 Reason for republication:  Degraded Assets 

By Dan Bauman
Date: October 31, 2012



Trustees who donated

Mark Burkhart, President and Chief Executive Officer, Cassidy Turley

Robert M. Cox, Jr., Sr. Vice President in Administration, Ret., Emerson Electric Co.

Thomas Cornwell, adjunct professor, Webster University, President, Ret., DRS Sustainment Systems, Inc.

Michael DeHaven, Sr. VP and General Counsel, BJC HealthCare

Alison N. Ferring, Civic Leader
Married to John Ferring, President, Plaze, Inc.

Steven L. Finerty, Chairman, Argent Capital Management
Married to Linda Finetry, community leader

Marilyn Fox, civic leader,
Married to Sam Fox, founder, former CEO, Harbour Group

Ronald J. Kruszewski, Chairman and CEO, Stifel, Nicolaus and Co., Inc.

Paul Joesph McKee III, President, Paric Corporation
Married to Brenda McKee, homemaker

Michael Neidorff, Chairman and CEO, Centene Corporation
Married to Noemi Neidorff, homemaker

Gregory Nelson, Sr. Vice President, Gen. Counsel, and Secretary, Ameren Corporation

Jerry Ritter, Civic Leader, former executive, Anheuser Busch

George Scherer, Executive Vice President and CFO, Ret., McCarthy Building Companies, Inc.
Married to Joan Scherer

William W. Snyder, Executive VP and CFO, Enterprise Holdings, Inc.

David Steward, Chairman, World Wide Technology, Inc.
Married to Thelma Steward, homemaker

Anthony Thompson, President and CEO, Kwame Building Group, Inc.
Married to Kim Thompson, homemaker

James D. Weddle, Managing Partner, Edward Jones

Douglas H. Yaeger, Chairman, President and CEO, Ret., The Laclede Group Inc.

George H. Walker III, Chairman Emeritus, Stifel, Nicolaus and Co., Inc



Trustees who did not donate

Brenda Newberry, Chair of the Board, Founder and Chair, Ret., The Newberry Group, Inc.

Steven O. Swyers, Vice Chair of the Board, Partner, PricewaterhouseCoopers, LLP

Sheila Baxter, Brigadier General Ret., Western Regional Medical Command

Amelia J. Bond, President and CEO, Greater Saint Louis Community Foundation

Dale Cammon, Chairman & Co-Chief Executive Officer, Bryant Group, Inc.

Alexander Bayard Clark III, Executive Vice President and CFO, Ret., Commerce Bancshares, Inc.

Clark Davis, Vice Chairman, Phantom Works, HOK Group, Inc.

Darryl Davis, President, Phantom Works, The Boeing Company

Ed Glotzbach, Vice Chairman, Information Services Group, Inc.

Phil Koen, CEO, Intermedia

Paul Lee, President, Delta Energy LLC

Lee Metcalf, Rear Admiral, Ret., United States Navy

Elizabeth Robb, Chief Executive Officer, Robb Partners

Markus Trice, Co-founder and Managing Partner, Compass Equity Advisors

Patricia D. Whitaker, CEO, Arcturis

Lynn Wittels, President and CEO, St. Louis Jewish Community Center

Michael Zambrana, Owner, President, CEO, Pangea Group

Kristofer (Kris) Knapstein, President, Alumni Association, Vice President, Cassidy Turley

Laurence Browning Jr., Vice Chairman, Ret., Emerson
